comments:
To reproduce (with Eclipse 3.3M2 and GEF 3.2.1):
- create a new Project
- Ctrl+N and under Examples, choose Logic Diagram, click Next
- select your new Project as parent folder, click Finish
- open a Properties View, set to detached
- make sure nothing is selected in the Logic Graphical Editor (the Properties View should display a "Connection Router" property, with a CCombo drop-down based value)
- in the Value drop-down, select something other than what is currently selected
- open the drop-down again, without selecting anything click anywhere in the workbench
- observe the following error:

java.lang.RuntimeException: WARNING: Prevented recursive attempt to activate part org.eclipse.ui.views.PropertySheet while still in the middle of activating part org.eclipse.jdt.ui.PackageExplorer

This is just a hunch, but I may have just reported the SWT bug that could be causing this problem. Adding dependency on bug 159170 to link bugs.

Can you reproduce every time?  What about using workbench 3.2.1?
Yes, I've also reproduced in in 3.2.1, and 3.3M1.
